mapper.select: SELECT r.review_idx AS reviewIdx, r.user_id AS userId, r.restaurant_id AS restaurantId, r.comment, r.create_date AS createDate, r.rating, r.reply_content AS replyContent, r.reply_date AS replyDate, f.stored_filename AS storedFilename FROM review r LEFT OUTER JOIN file f ON r.review_idx = f.review_id WHERE r.restaurant_id = #{restaurantId} ORDER BY r.review_idx DESC

SELECT rw.review_idx as reviewIdx, rw.user_id as userId, rw.restaurant_id as restaurantId, rw.reservation_id as reservationId, rw.comment as comment , rw.create_date as createDate, rw.rating as rating, rw.reply_content as replyContent, rw.reply_date as replyDate, f.stored_filename as storedFilename FROM review rw LEFT OUTER JOIN file f ON rw.review_idx = f.review_id WHERE rw.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY rw.create_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (user_id, restaurant_id, comment, create_date, rating, reservation_id) VALUES (#{userId},#{restaurantId}, #{comment}, now(), #{rating} ,#{reservationId} )
